message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, my price for this product is $18,000. I believe it offers significant value that justifies this price.
I understand your point about the product's value, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it.
